## Git 

+ Git is awesome
+ For the thorough-breds: [Jenny Bryan's Git book](http://happygitwithr.com/)
+ For the concise-minded: [Concise Git Tutorial](https://github.com/shekhargulati/git-the-missing-tutorial)

## What You Should Do

+ Create a GitHub account: [github.com/join](https://github.com/join)
+ Download [GitKraken](https://www.gitkraken.com/) locally
+ Fork the course repository to your own account
+ Set upstream: https://github.com/akzaidi/R-cadence.git
    - git remote add upstream https://github.com/akzaidi/R-cadence.git
